Tucson quickly realizes that his com link was still engaged.  He gets a sli=
ght startled, but with a very sheepish grin on his face, he tries to answer=
 Lord Elder the best he can.

"Oh, Lord Elder, Kup, sorry about that.. I'm =
fine, nothing's wrong.. Nothing - at all..  I - I..  Um, well, I - just got=
 a very strong batch of Energon and it kind of threw me off guard..  Caused=
 all sorts of power surges but I assure you I'm no worse for ware.  I - was=
 just on my way to Nightstrike when I ran a little low on fuel, so I was gi=
ven something here and it had a few side effects...  Look, I'm a little tie=
d up right now, I'll definitely get back to you when I have more time.  Tuc=
son Prime out."

This time he manages to disengage the com link.

"Ohh boy,=
 I sure hope he bought that one.  It's not like me to lie but some things a=
re best kept to ourselves. And this time, I remember where I left off."

He=
 had not realized it but Tucson was capable of many emotions, love being on=
e of them.

Outside the storage area, Rat Trap tries to cover for Tucson an=
d looks over to the area while scratching behind his head.

"Hmm, Wheels we=
nt inta the storage bay.  He could've had ta replace a tire or two and is h=
avn' a hard time lookn' for tires that fit his specs.  Isn't too easy findn=
' wheels for that big guy I bet."

he whole situation.
